thread.title: Snapchat murder girls, 14 and 13, recorded suspected killer ordering them ‘down the hill’ after taking photo of him on their phones moments before their deaths
thread.title_full: Snapchat murder girls, 14 and 13, recorded suspected killer ordering them ‘down the hill’ after taking photo of him on their phones moments before their deaths

title: Snapchat murder girls, 14 and 13, recorded suspected killer ordering them ‘down the hill’ after taking photo of him on their phones moments before their deaths
text:
Opinion VOICE OF A KILLER Snapchat murder girls, 14 and 13, recorded suspected killer ordering them ‘down the hill’ after taking photo of him on their phones moments before their deaths 
Liberty German, 14, Abigail Williams, 13, were found about a quarter-mile from an abandoned railroad bridge By MARYSE GODDEN and SAM WEBB 22nd February 2017, 5:54 pm
